Text.Page:
!
It's me, Amarre.

I knew you'd remembered!
I'm still investigating the Murderwings and Mournwings.

I think the Mysterium is getting close to an answer.
It's not a perfect one, but it'll help.

We're going to use Aura Sentinels, but it'll only be able to cover a small area.

The Murderwings and Mournwings are spreading more and more, even as we speak.
